job_tasks.phrase: Our team builds products and infrastructure that enable retail advertisers to succeed on Reddit.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core function of the team, which is to build products and infrastructure, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Catalog System Scaling - In order to support larger and more sophisticated advertisers, we must scale our system to support millions of products per customer.
job_tasks.justification: Scaling a system to handle a large volume of data and users is a core software engineering responsibility focused on performance and capacity.

job_tasks.phrase: You'd have the opportunity to load test, identify bottlenecks, and deploy optimizations to make these customers successful.
job_tasks.justification: Load testing, identifying bottlenecks, and deploying optimizations are all traditional software engineering activities aimed at improving system performance and reliability.

job_tasks.phrase: Catalog Management - With millions of products, advertisers need tools to manage those products, identify errors, and build campaigns based on subsets of products.
job_tasks.justification: Building tools for managing products and identifying errors falls under the umbrella of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Product Enhancement - Leveraging AI and LLMs to make our products more appealing to users by showcasing products popular with Redditors, enhancing product image backgrounds with GenAI, and much more!
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leveraging AI and LLMs for product enhancement, which involves working with models, even if the specific task of development or fine-tuning isn't detailed here, it implies model application.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop, maintain, and scale our product catalogs backend
job_tasks.justification: Developing, maintaining, and scaling a backend system is a direct software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of features to make our product easier to use
job_tasks.justification: Developing features for a product is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Produce robust and sustainable code and demonstrate proficiency in debugging systems beyond your immediate responsibilities.
job_tasks.justification: Producing robust code and debugging systems are fundamental software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Uphold high-quality standards within the team.
job_tasks.justification: Upholding quality standards is a general software engineering practice related to the development process.

soft_skills.phrase: Our team builds products and infrastructure that enable retail advertisers to succeed on Reddit.
soft_skills.justification: While not a direct soft skill mention, the context of enabling advertisers implies a need for understanding and supporting users, which requires communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Uphold high-quality standards within the team.
soft_skills.justification: Upholding standards within a team inherently involves collaboration and shared responsibility.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on core software engineering tasks such as developing, maintaining, and scaling backend systems, load testing, identifying bottlenecks, and producing robust code. While it mentions leveraging AI and LLMs for 'Product Enhancement,' this is presented as a feature integration rather than the primary focus of the role. The majority of the responsibilities and technologies listed fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), with only a minor mention of AI/LLM application. Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines core software engineering responsibilities and lists specific technologies. The mention of AI/LLMs is present but not the dominant theme, making the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile a strong fit. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the depth of AI/LLM involvement is not extensively detailed.
